headline.print_headline: How Gentrification Is Changing the Face of Harlem
headline.main: How Gentrification Is Changing the Face of Harlem

snippet: Harlem is “a shell of its former self” says one reader; it remains “the iconic African-American cultural nexus,” says another.
lead_paragraph: Harlem is “a shell of its former self” says one reader; it remains “the iconic African-American cultural nexus,” says another.
